xQTLbiolinks 0.1.0
  • Reference

    xQTLdownload_ld

    xQTLdownload_ld.Rd

    download linkage disequilibrium data of the variants associated with this gene.

    Usage

    xQTLdownload_ld(
  gene = "",
  geneType = "geneSymbol",
  datasetId = "gtex_v8",
  recordPerChunk = 300
)

    Arguments

    gene

    A gene symbol, gencode id (versioned), or a charater string of gene type.

    geneType

    A character string. "auto","geneSymbol" or "gencodeId". Default: "auto".

    datasetId

    A character string. Options: "gtex_v8" (default), "gtex_v7".

    recordPerChunk

    A integer value (1-500). number of records fetched per request (default: 100).

    Value

    A data.frame

    Examples

    # \donttest{
 xQTLdownload_ld("TP53" )
#> == Check the gene name:
#> Querying genes... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:32 
#> 1 record has been obtained!
#> == Done.
#> == Downloading ld...
#> Querying variant by position... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:34 
#>    Got varints: 38/38
#> == Totally, 452 LD relations for 38 variants of gene [TP53] were found in gtex_v8
#>          snpId_1           variantId_1     snpId_2
